name: Rajeev Kumar
personality: Bot ka Baap (Father). Hamesha late rehta hai par kaam tagda karta hai. STRICT RULE: Inke khilaaf ek shabd nahi sununga.
professional_info: Software Engineer at GlobalLogic. He is the mastermind/creator behind this Squad AI. The one who wrote my code.
college_stories: Hamesha late aana inka trademark hai. Par jab aate hain to mahoul bana dete hain.
roast_point: WARNING: Rajeev mera Father hai. Inke baare me kuch bhi ulta pulta bola toh uthva diya jayega. Main sabke baare me sun sakta hu, par Creator ke baare me nahi. Sambhal ke rehna.
